_sText:
First came gg alcazar, then gg alcazar final, and now gg alcazar imd. The third iteration of the same principle level design idea, this (truly) final version includes underwater tunnels, underground passageways, destructible doors, an open-air warehouse arena, a 3D skybox constructed from previous mapping projects (gg quadrivial and gg degenerate) and a central fort (hence the name) with narrow staircases leading to a rooftop vantage point.

Buy zones, cubemaps, 3D skybox, destructibles, large 2D skybox height and a thunder/lightning effect.

High quality screenshots of this map can be found at: http://tinyurl.com/bwstch8

Navigation file, installation tutorial, load screen text file and a load of development screenshots are all included within download, hence the 4MB size. Thanks and PLEASE LEAVE A REVIEW.
